articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: A Soviet-era spacecraft built to land on Venus is falling to Earth instead - Ars Technica
articles.description: Kosmos 482 is encased in a titanium heat shield, with a good chance of reaching the surface intact.

articles.author: Josh Funk, John Seewer
articles.title: Overhaul of the troubled US air traffic control system will revolutionize the industry, Trump says - AP News
articles.description: The Trump administration has proposed a multibillion-dollar overhaul of the U.S. air traffic control system in the wake of recent deadly plane crashes and technical failures that have put a spotlight on the outdated network. Transportation Secretary Sean Duff…
articles.content: The Trump administration on Thursday proposed a multibillion-dollar overhaul of a U.S. air traffic control system that it said still relies on floppy disks and replacement parts found on eBay and has… [+4904 chars]
